Rulings.Base: 1. The top card of your Deck is removed from play when the effect of "Dimensional Alchemist" resolves.

PSCT.Edison:
① Once per turn: You can banish the top card of your Deck (face-up), and if you do, until the End Phase, this card gains 500 ATK.
② When this card you control is destroyed and sent to your GY: 
You can target 1 of your banished monsters; return it to your hand.

return it to your hand.

PSCT.Base: Once per turn, you can activate this effect to remove from play the top card of your Deck and give this card 500 ATK until the End Phase. When this card is destroyed and sent from your side of the field to your Graveyard, you can select 1 of your removed from play monsters and return it to your hand.
